pageContext.claim: “And at the heart of our plan itself is the tremendous relief for working families and small businesses.”
pageContext.analysis: No matter how you slice it, the super wealthy do rather well under the House GOP proposal. Not only do they benefit from a reduction in tax rates, but there are numerous other provisions that benefits the wealthy, including repeal of the alternative minimum tax and lower rate for pass-through entities. The top one percent end up with about 47 percent of the tax cuts, according to the Tax Policy Center.
